title: 95/492/EC: Commission Decision of 15 November 1995 amending Decision 94/652/EC establishing the inventory and distribution of tasks to be undertaken within the framework of cooperation by Member States in the scientific examination of questions relating to food
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 15 November 1995 amending Decision 94/652/EC establishing  the inventory and distribution of tasks to be undertaken within the framework of cooperation by  Member States in the scientific examination of questions relating to food (Text with EEA relevance)  (95/492/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Decision 94/652/EC is hereby replaced by the Annex to  this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 15 November 1995.
For the Commission Martin BANGEMANN Member of the Commission
ANNEX
INVENTORY OF TASKS TO BE UNDERTAKEN BY MEMBER STATES WITHIN THE FRAMEWORK OF  COOPERATION BY THE MEMBER STATES IN THE SCIENTIFIC EXAMINATION OF QUESTIONS RELATING TO FOOD
